General.Name: Sukgyung AT Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Sukgyung AT Co., Ltd. develops and manufactures inorganic powders in fine and dispersion forms in South Korea. Its products include ytterbium fluoride, ba glass and sr glass, composites, radiopaque cement, hydroxyapatite, tricalcium phosphate, dicalcium phosphate dehydrate, ytterbium fluoride, hydroxyapatite, spherical titanium dioxide, zinc oxide, micron spherical silicon dioxide, colloidal silver, and zinc silica composite. The company also provides spherical silicon and titanium dioxide, tin oxide, aluminum oxide, and hollow silica; indium zinc oxide, zinc oxide, antimony tin oxide, silica acrylic polymer composites, titanium dioxide, zirconium oxide, zinc oxide, hollow silica, magnesium flouride, and transparent inorganic pigments; and ytterbium oxide, yttrium oxide, lanthanum oxide, synthetic huntite, and synthetic hydromagnesite, as well as high purity aluminum oxide, magnesium oxide, spherical silicon dioxide, and silica gel. Its products are used in a range of fields, including dental, medical, cosmetic, toner, electric/electronic, coating, and others. Sukgyung AT Co., Ltd. offers its products through sales representatives in Asia, North America, and Europe. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Ansan-city, South Korea.
